### msqchr

Some fasta files contain all chromosomes from one genomeï¼Œsometimes users have to split these chromosomes into different files according to their number label.The msqchr can help to handle this, so that the choosed chromosome fasta file can be used for downstream analysis.

### Installation

```{r installation, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("MSQ-123/msqchr")
```
